languages.text: "Ты взял{mf||а} себе в свиту законника? Я побрезговал. Я быстро понял{mf||а}, что Стракс ест с руки у Вультур и подмял этих жалких заговорщиков под себя. Теперь Арбитес — мои домашние собачки, исполнительные, но туповатые, чтобы приближать хоть кого-то к себе".

"You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."
languages.original_text: "Ты взял{mf||а} себе в свиту законника? Я побрезговал. Я быстро понял{mf||а}, что Стракс ест с руки у Вультур и подмял этих жалких заговорщиков под себя. Теперь Арбитес — мои домашние собачки, исполнительные, но туповатые, чтобы приближать хоть кого-то к себе".

traits.locale_text: "You took a lawman into your retinue? I disdained from his company. I quickly realised that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now the Arbites are my lapdogs, obedient, but too dull for me to bring any one of them into my circle."

"You took a lawman into your retinue? I disdained from his company. I quickly realised that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now the Arbites are my lapdogs, obedient, but too dull for me to bring any one of them into my circle."

"You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

"You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

"You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

languages.text: “你让那个法务官加入了你的队伍？我鄙夷他的陪伴，因为我没过多久就发现，斯塔克斯已经彻底变成了沃尔图尔的狗。于是，我让那些不值一提的野心家全都跪在了我面前。如今，整个法务部都成了我的狗。他们很听话，但太无聊了，根本没法融入我的圈子。”
languages.original_text: "You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

traits.locale_text: “你让那个法务官加入了你的队伍？我鄙夷他的陪伴，因为我没过多久就发现，斯塔克斯已经彻底变成了沃尔图尔的狗。于是，我让那些不值一提的野心家全都跪在了我面前。如今，整个法务部都成了我的狗。他们很听话，但太无聊了，根本没法融入我的圈子。”

languages.text: «¿Acogiste al defensor de la ley en tu séquito? Yo deseché su compañía. No tardó en quedarme claro que Vultur tenía a Strachs en la palma de la mano, así que acabé con su patética conspiración. Ahora los miembros del Arbites me sirven como perros falderos: obedientes, pero demasiado insulsos como para ser mis compañeros».
languages.original_text: "You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

traits.locale_text: «¿Acogiste al defensor de la ley en tu séquito? Yo deseché su compañía. No tardó en quedarme claro que Vultur tenía a Strachs en la palma de la mano, así que acabé con su patética conspiración. Ahora los miembros del Arbites me sirven como perros falderos: obedientes, pero demasiado insulsos como para ser mis compañeros».

languages.text: « Cet homme de loi a rejoint votre entourage ? J'ai refusé qu'il intègre le mien. J'ai compris assez rapidement que Strachs était à la solde de Vultur, j'ai donc décidé de mettre ces pathétiques conspirateurs à ma botte. Désormais, l'Arbites m'obéit à la lettre, mais je ne vois pas l'intérêt d'inviter de tels imbéciles dans mon cercle rapproché. »
languages.original_text: "You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

traits.locale_text: « Cet homme de loi a rejoint votre entourage ? J'ai refusé qu'il intègre le mien. J'ai compris assez rapidement que Strachs était à la solde de Vultur, j'ai donc décidé de mettre ces pathétiques conspirateurs à ma botte. Désormais, l'Arbites m'obéit à la lettre, mais je ne vois pas l'intérêt d'inviter de tels imbéciles dans mon cercle rapproché. »

languages.text: 「お前はあの法執行官を自分の従者に加えたのか？私は彼の仲間を軽蔑してた。すぐにヴァルターがストラッチスたちを手なずけていることが分かったので、あの哀れな共謀者たちを従わせたんだ。今や高等裁定局は私の忠実な使い走りだけど、従順すぎて私の従者に加えるには物足りないな」
languages.original_text: "You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はあの法執行官を自分の従者に加えたのか？私は彼の仲間を軽蔑してた。すぐにヴァルターがストラッチスたちを手なずけていることが分かったので、あの哀れな共謀者たちを従わせたんだ。今や高等裁定局は私の忠実な使い走りだけど、従順すぎて私の従者に加えるには物足りないな」

languages.text: "O kanuncuyu maiyetine mi aldın? Ondan hoşlanmazdım. Vultur'un Strachs'ı avucunun içine aldığını kısa sürede anladım ve o zavallı komplocuları hizaya getirdim. Şimdi Arbites mensupları benim köpeğim oldu, uysallar ama hiçbirini kendi çevreme almayacağım kadar donuklar."
languages.original_text: "You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

traits.locale_text: "O kanuncuyu maiyetine mi aldın? Ondan hoşlanmazdım. Vultur'un Strachs'ı avucunun içine aldığını kısa sürede anladım ve o zavallı komplocuları hizaya getirdim. Şimdi Arbites mensupları benim köpeğim oldu, uysallar ama hiçbirini kendi çevreme almayacağım kadar donuklar."

languages.text: "Ihr habt den Gesetzeshüter in Euer Gefolge aufgenommen? Ich habe seine Gesellschaft gehasst. Mir wurde ziemlich schnell klar, dass Strachs Vultur aus der Hand fraß, also brachte ich diese jämmerlichen Verschwörer unter Kontrolle. Jetzt sind die Arbites meine Schoßhunde – gehorsam, aber zu dumm, um irgendeinen von ihnen in meinem Kreis aufzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "You took the lawman into your retinue? I disdained his company. It became clear to me pretty quickly that Vultur had Strachs eating out of her hand, and so I brought those pathetic conspirators to heel. Now, the Arbites are my lapdogs — obedient, but too dull for me to bring any of them into my circle."

Mir wurde ziemlich schnell klar, dass Strachs Vultur aus der Hand fraß, also brachte ich diese jämmerlichen Verschwörer unter Kontrolle. Jetzt sind die Arbites meine Schoßhunde – gehorsam, aber zu dumm, um irgendeinen von ihnen in meinem Kreis aufzunehmen."
